verified_bitcoin_claims: Bitcoin price consistency across multiple sources within 1.3% variance ($111,540-$112,971)
Fear & Greed Index at neutral 48 confirmed across discovery and real-time validation
Network hash rate demonstrating strength at 963.27 EH/s, 1.3% above discovery data
Mempool showing healthy transaction throughput with 80,382 pending transactions
Active addresses count verified at 768,977 confirming network usage patterns
questionable_claims: Mining difficulty data shows significant variance between discovery (92.67T) and current (136.04T) - 46.8% difference requires investigation
MVRV Z-Score of -1.8245 in discovery file cannot be independently validated due to BGGeometrics service unavailability
CoinMetrics premium cycle indicators (NUPL, Reserve Risk) unverifiable due to API access limitations
inaccurate_claims: Discovery file shows 7 operational CLI services but validation confirms only 5 operational (71.4% availability)
CLI service health claimed as 1.0 in discovery but measured at 0.71 during validation
unverifiable_claims: MVRV-based cycle positioning claims dependent on BGGeometrics data unavailable during validation
Premium CoinMetrics indicators including NUPL zones and Reserve Risk assessment
LTH/STH NUPL breakdown (-0.35/-0.55) cannot be independently confirmed

required_corrections: Resolve mining difficulty data inconsistency between sources
Establish backup data sources for MVRV and cycle indicators
Implement service health monitoring with realistic availability scores
Add data freshness timestamps to prevent stale data usage
bitcoin_monitoring_requirements: Real-time service health monitoring for all 7 CLI services
Multi-source validation for critical cycle indicators
Price consistency monitoring with 2% variance thresholds
Network metrics cross-validation between Mempool.space and Blockchain.com

primary_detractors: Unverifiable cycle indicators due to API limitations

required_improvements: Establish redundant data sources for critical indicators
Resolve data consistency issues across sources

validation_methodology_notes.validation_approach: Multi-source cross-validation with fail-fast quality gates
validation_methodology_notes.data_freshness_requirement: Real-time data within 5 minutes of analysis
validation_methodology_notes.confidence_calculation: Weighted average of component scores with service availability penalties
validation_methodology_notes.institutional_standards: Morgan Stanley institutional research quality benchmarks applied
